description: This module provides students fundamental knowledge and understanding of the architectural practice in Singapore. Lectures are structured under 3 categories namely: A. Context of Architecture Practice – topics include state of construction industry, changing landscape in construction industry and emergent technologies, future trajectory B. Law & Architect – topics include ethics, professional duties and responsibilities, codes and practices, planning and building control agencies C. Contract & Architect – Legal system and forms of building contract
title: Architectural Practice
